mapper.select: select id, box_id, box_assetid, put_store_number, ice_alarm_rule_detail_id, limit_count, keep_time, today_count, status, create_time, update_time from pxt_db_ajq.t_ice_alarm_opencount where id = #{id}

select id, box_id, box_assetid, put_store_number, ice_alarm_rule_detail_id, limit_count, keep_time, today_count, status, create_time, update_time from pxt_db_ajq.t_ice_alarm_opencount limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into pxt_db_ajq.t_ice_alarm_opencount(box_id, box_assetid, put_store_number, ice_alarm_rule_detail_id, limit_count, keep_time, today_count, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{boxId}, #{boxAssetid}, #{putStoreNumber}, #{iceAlarmRuleDetailId}, #{limitCount}, #{keepTime}, #{todayCount}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into pxt_db_ajq.t_ice_alarm_opencount(box_id, box_assetid, put_store_number, ice_alarm_rule_detail_id, limit_count, keep_time, today_count, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.boxId}, #{entity.boxAssetid}, #{entity.putStoreNumber}, #{entity.iceAlarmRuleDetailId}, #{entity.limitCount}, #{entity.keepTime}, #{entity.todayCount}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into pxt_db_ajq.t_ice_alarm_opencount(box_id, box_assetid, put_store_number, ice_alarm_rule_detail_id, limit_count, keep_time, today_count, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.boxId}, #{entity.boxAssetid}, #{entity.putStoreNumber}, #{entity.iceAlarmRuleDetailId}, #{entity.limitCount}, #{entity.keepTime}, #{entity.todayCount}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update box_id = values(box_id) , box_assetid = values(box_assetid) , put_store_number = values(put_store_number) , ice_alarm_rule_detail_id = values(ice_alarm_rule_detail_id) , limit_count = values(limit_count) , keep_time = values(keep_time) , today_count = values(today_count) , status = values(status) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update pxt_db_ajq.t_ice_alarm_opencount
box_id = #{boxId},
box_assetid = #{boxAssetid},
put_store_number = #{putStoreNumber},
ice_alarm_rule_detail_id = #{iceAlarmRuleDetailId},
limit_count = #{limitCount},
keep_time = #{keepTime},
today_count = #{todayCount},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
